select allocate.id, allocate.allocate_no, allocate.allocate_status, allocate.allocate_qty, allocate.allocate_type, allocate.ship_wh, allocate.receipt_wh, allocate.consignee_user, staff.full_name as consigneeUserName, allocate.consignee_country_code, allocate.consignee_user_telephone, allocate.consignee_user_mail, allocate.created_time, param1.parameter_name as shipWhName, param2.parameter_name as receiptWhName from ope_allocate_order allocate left join ope_sys_staff staff on allocate.consignee_user = staff.id left join platform.pla_sys_param_setting param1 on allocate.ship_wh = param1.id left join platform.pla_sys_param_setting param2 on allocate.receipt_wh = param2.id where allocate.dr = 0 and allocate.allocate_type = #{enter.classType}
order by allocate.created_time desc limit #{enter.startRow},#{enter.pageSize}

select id as whId, parameter_name as whName from platform.pla_sys_param_setting where dr = 0
and parameter_name = '中国成品库'
and parameter_name != '中国成品库'

select allocate.id, allocate.allocate_no, allocate.allocate_status, allocate.ship_wh, allocate.receipt_wh, allocate.consignee_user, staff.full_name as consigneeUserName, allocate.consignee_country_code, allocate.consignee_user_telephone, allocate.consignee_user_mail, allocate.consignee_post_code, allocate.consignee_address, allocate.created_time, allocate.remark, param1.parameter_name as shipWhName, param2.parameter_name as receiptWhName, allocate.consignee_country_code, allocate.notify_user, allocate.notify_user_name, allocate.notify_country_code, allocate.notify_user_telephone, allocate.notify_user_mail from ope_allocate_order allocate left join ope_sys_staff staff on allocate.consignee_user = staff.id left join platform.pla_sys_param_setting param1 on allocate.ship_wh = param1.id left join platform.pla_sys_param_setting param2 on allocate.receipt_wh = param2.id where allocate.dr = 0 and allocate.id = #{id}

select scooter.id as id, scooter.group_id as groupId, scooter.color_id as colorId, scooter.qty as qty, scooter.expect_delivery_date as expectDeliveryDate, scooter.expect_ship_date as expectShipDate, group1.group_name as groupName, color.color_value as colorValue, color.color_name as colorName from ope_allocate_scooter_b scooter left join ope_specificat_group group1 on group1.id = scooter.group_id left join ope_color color on color.id = scooter.color_id where scooter.allocate_id = #{id} and scooter.dr = 0

select combin.id, combin.combin_name, combin.production_combin_bom_id, combin.qty, combin.expect_delivery_date, combin.expect_ship_date, bom.bom_no from ope_allocate_combin_b combin left join ope_production_combin_bom bom on bom.id = combin.production_combin_bom_id where combin.dr = 0 and combin.allocate_id = #{id}

select parts.id, parts.parts_id, parts.parts_name, parts.parts_no, parts.parts_type, parts.qty, parts.expect_delivery_date, parts.expect_ship_date from ope_allocate_parts_b parts where parts.dr = 0 and parts.allocate_id = #{id}

select entrust.id, entrust.entrust_no, entrust.entrust_status, entrust.created_time from ope_entrust_order entrust left join ope_invoice_order invoice on invoice.id = entrust.invoice_id left join ope_purchase_order purchase on purchase.id = invoice.purchase_id left join ope_allocate_order allocate on allocate.id = purchase.allocate_id where entrust.dr = 0 and allocate.id = #{id}

select trace.id, trace.relation_id, trace.op_type, trace.remark, trace.created_time, staff.full_name as createdByName from ope_op_trace trace left join ope_sys_staff staff on trace.created_by = staff.id where trace.dr = 0 and trace.relation_id = #{id} order by trace.created_time desc

SELECT count(*) FROM ope_out_whouse_order wh LEFT JOIN ope_invoice_order invoice on invoice.id = wh.invoice_id LEFT JOIN ope_purchase_order purchase on purchase.id = invoice.purchase_id LEFT JOIN ope_allocate_order allocate on allocate.id = purchase.allocate_id where wh.dr = 0 and allocate.id = #{id} and wh.out_wh_status in (10,20)
select id, allocate_no as orderNo, created_time from ope_allocate_order where dr = 0 and id = #{id}
